text: Kiya inn kay paon hain jin say woh chaltay hon ya unn kay haath hain jin say woh kissi cheez ko thaam saken ya unn ki aankhen hain jin say woh dekhtay hon ya unn kay kaan hain jin say woh suntay hain aap keh dijiye! Tum apney sab shurka ko bula lo phir meri zarar saani ki tadbeer kero phir mujh ko zara mohlat mat do
